ref: 14343 *kacca -- 1: with emph. aspiration (rather than < *khacca -- s.v. *kicca -- ): Dm. khača ʻ dirty, bad ʼ; Gaw. khaċ, khas ʻ bad ʼ, Kal. khāčä ʻ bad, dirty (?) ʼ; Sv. khačo ʻ dirty, bad ʼ; Phal. khāču ʻ bad ʼ, khāčo ʻ lie ʼ, khāčulo ʻ dirty, bad ʼ; Sh. khăčár f. ʻ ingratitude ʼ, khăčḗlū ʻ miserly ʼ.
